translation.to paste the last transcript. Useful wh: to paste the last transcript. Useful when you forgot to select an input field when you started recording.
translation.A fast keyboard user usually types aroun: A fast keyboard user usually types around 80 words per minute. You can speak much faster.
translation.Add technical terms, names, or specializ: Add technical terms, names, or specialized vocabulary
translation.Adjust system preferences to control Mur: Adjust system preferences to control Murmure's behavior at startup and more.
translation.All audio is deleted. No telemetry, no t: All audio is deleted. No telemetry, no tracking. Only the last five text transcriptions are stored on your computer.
translation.All processing happens locally on your d: All processing happens locally on your device. No data ever leaves your computer.
translation.Allows external apps to transcribe .wav: Allows external apps to transcribe .wav files via HTTP.
translation.Are you sure you want to clear all trans: Are you sure you want to clear all transcription history? This action cannot be undone.
translation.Choose when to show the recording overla: Choose when to show the recording overlay.
translation.Choose whether the overlay appears at th: Choose whether the overlay appears at the top or bottom.
translation.Choose your preferred language for the i: Choose your preferred language for the interface.
translation.Data processed locally instead of being: Data processed locally instead of being sent to the Cloud this month.
translation.Free and open source software. Inspect,: Free and open source software. Inspect, modify, and contribute.
translation.Free and open source under GNU GPL v3 Li: Free and open source under GNU GPL v3 License.
translation.If enabled, Murmure will start automatic: If enabled, Murmure will start automatically when your system starts.
translation.Improve your workflow by setting up keyb: Improve your workflow by setting up keyboard shortcuts.
translation.Keep transcription in clipboard after re: Keep transcription in clipboard after recording finishes
translation.Murmure removes all audio files after pr: Murmure removes all audio files after processing and only keeps your five latest transcriptions, stored locally on your device.
translation.Murmure use default microphone to record: Murmure use default microphone to record your voice.
translation.Murmure uses NVIDIA's Parakeet TDT model: Murmure uses NVIDIA's Parakeet TDT model, a highly optimized transformer-based speech recognition system designed for low-latency on-device inference.
translation.NVIDIA's state-of-the-art speech recogni: NVIDIA's state-of-the-art speech recognition model runs entirely on-device.
translation.Personalize your Murmure experience by a: Personalize your Murmure experience by adding technical terms, names, or specialized vocabulary to the dictionary (optimized for both English and French).
translation.Privacy-first speech-to-text, running en: Privacy-first speech-to-text, running entirely on your machine
translation.Set the port number for the HTTP API (10: Set the port number for the HTTP API (1024-65535)
translation.Store the last five transcriptions on di: Store the last five transcriptions on disk. Disable to keep history in memory only.
translation.That’s thousands of ideas turned into te: That’s thousands of ideas turned into text, without typing a single key.
translation.Total words written with Murmure this mo: Total words written with Murmure this month.
translation.Your average words per minute with Murmu: Your average words per minute with Murmure this month.
translation.Zero tracking, zero analytics. Your data: Zero tracking, zero analytics. Your data stays yours, always.
